text:
-20-
INKELES:
(CONT) the Politburo makes certain that its orders are
carried out in accord with the Party line. The Party
Secretary you met is the head of the Party unit within
our valve factory. When a factory has begun to fall
behind in fulfilling its plan, the ministry and party
organizations begin to apply pressure on the director.
And there is only one thing he can do to get his factory
out of trouble, and thatTs fulfill the plan.
